concept.definition: The application sends requests and receives responses.
The application receives requests and sends responses.

description: The mode of a message conformance statement.
name: ConformanceEventMode

text.div:
ConformanceEventMode

The mode of a message conformance statement.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/message-conformance-event-mode defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
sender SenderThe application sends requests and receives responses.
receiver ReceiverThe application receives requests and sends responses.
